name: "North By North Quahog" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the very beginning of the episode, which is not a show that Peter said FOX needed to make room for?
questions.explanation:
The OC.

	After more than three years, "Family Guy" was brought back on the air.  Peter lists off many other canceled FOX shows that were never brought back onto the air.  Other shows in his list included "Titus", "Dark Angel", and "Wanda at Large"."Family Guy" was renewed for a fourth season because of fan support and astounding DVD sales.

questions.text: In the beginning of the show, Lois returns home after shopping.  Where did she buy her new sheets?
questions.explanation:
Bed, Bath, and Beyond.

	Peter says that Lois shouldn't shop in the "Beyond" section of the store, and we are shown a clip where Peter opens a door into "the beyond" only to find a sale on porcelain mugs.  Lois and Peter decide to sleep on their new sheets that night.

questions.text: Who is the first person that Lois fantasizes about while she and Peter are making love?
questions.explanation:
George Clooney.

	Peter is astonished that Lois would even be thinking of anyone else while they were making love so he suggests that they try to spice up their love life.  His first idea is to hook up a car battery to his nipples, but they soon decide to go on a second honeymoon.  They leave Brian in charge of the kids while they are gone.

questions.text: Where do Lois and Peter decide to go on their second honeymoon as their first choice?
questions.explanation:
Cape Cod.

	During the drive to Cape Cod, Peter drives down the road and finds a "Jughead" comic book on the seat next to him, so he decides to read it.  When he is fully involved in reading the comic, he crashes the car into a tree and he and Lois are forced to stay at a truck stop for the night.

questions.text: What comic book does Stewie read to Meg and Chris while he and Brian are taking care of them?
questions.explanation:
Garfield.

	When Brian decides to read to Meg and Chris, he has a choice to either read "Garfield" comics or the novel adaptation of "Caddyshack", so he chooses to read "Caddyshack".  When Brian leaves, Stewie begins to read "Garfield at Large", the first "Garfield" comic book in the series.

questions.text: The name of the hotel that Peter and Lois stay at for their second honeymoon is called the Park Place Hotel.
questions.explanation:
False.

	After deciding not to go to Cape Cod, Lois and Peter head to Manhattan to stay at the new Park Barrington Hotel.  Peter pretends to be Mel Gibson and they get access to Mel Gibson's rarely-used private suite.

questions.text: When Lois and Peter find the secret projection room, they find that the sequel to "Passion of the Christ" is named "Passion of the Christ 2: ____________".
questions.explanation:
Crucify This.

	In the sequel, Jim Caviezel reprises his role as Christ and his sidekick is played by Chris Tucker.  Lois and Peter try to prevent the movie from being released, so they take it from the hotel and try to bury it in a field.  While this happens, Lois is kidnapped by Mel Gibson's guards.

questions.text: What is the name of Tom Tucker's wife?
questions.explanation:
Stacy.

	After Tom Tucker's son, Jake, gives Chris vodka during the school dance, Brian and Stewie decide to talk to Tom Tucker about his son's behavior.  In the end, Jake is sentenced to two hundred hours of community service for possession of drugs.

options: Down the road from the Florida Everglades
On his private island in Michigan
questions.explanation:
On top of  Mt. Rushmore

	In the climax of the episode, Peter goes to Mel Gibson's house and saves Lois while preventing Mel Gibson from reaching the copy of "The Passion of the Christ 2".  Gibson ends up falling off the monument, and Lois finally feels attracted to Peter.

questions.text: Who does not appear in this episode?
options: The evil monkey in Chris' closet
questions.explanation:
Quagmire.

	Oddly, none of Peter's neighbourhood friends appear at all in this episode.  The greased deaf guy from the toy factory's office party briefly appears in the end of the episode and the creepy old guy from "To Love and Die in Dixie" appears during the school dance.
